Docs.param: The question to answer.
A collection of to query.

The language of the text documents. This is the BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "es" for Spanish, etc. If not set, uses as the default, which falls back to the service default "en" when not configured.
An optional to cancel the request.
Docs.summary: Answers the specified question using the provided text documents (synchronous, with TextDocument collection).
Docs.exception: The service returned an error. The exception contains details of the service error.

The language of the text documents. This is the BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "es" for Spanish, etc. If not set, uses as the default, which falls back to the service default "en" when not configured.
An optional to cancel the request.
Docs.summary: Answers the specified question using the provided text documents (async).
Docs.exception: The service returned an error. The exception contains details of the service error.
